title: 'Hair' Brained Idea! Man Caught Smuggling 1 Kg Gold Under A Wig At Cochin Airport
text:
When it comes to smuggling things through customs, some people are ready to go to ridiculous lengths. Like this Cochin youth who was caught red-handed by Customs Air Intelligence Unit at Cochin International Airport Limited (CIAL) while attempting to smuggle in gold hidden under his wig.

Twitter/Hindu

According to a Hindu report, the man has been identified as Noushad, a native of Malappuram. Noushad came to Kerala from Sharjah and had hidden the gold mixture weighing 1.13 kilogram.

He even shaved off a portion of his hair in an attempt to pull off his fake hair and make space for the gold.

In the past, smugglers have swallowed things and concealed things under the feet to even rectum. The head was probably the only part they never experimented with. Unfortunately, even this stunt turned out to be an epic fail.

In another incident that took place in September, a man was arrested at the Delhi airport upon his arrival from the UAE for allegedly smuggling gold bars worth over Rs 31 lakh that were concealed in his rectum.

Picture For Representation/Reuters

Ahmed Washir, who arrived at Terminal-3 of the Indira Gandhi International Airport from Dubai by an Air India flight, was intercepted after he had crossed the green channel.

Reports state that seven gold bars weighing about 817 grams -- each weighing 10 tolas -- and one half cut piece gold bar weighing about 64.2 grams were found concealed inside his rectum.
